Please, please, please upvote the assholes!

I deserved to keep the new car I won from Jeopardy because I gave it to his mistress.
I deserve to get some nice flowers from the ammunition store because I paid to get some ammunition.
I usually check on my kids every now and then, but I didn't check on Chris because he was playing by himself instead of with the others.
I deserved a red card from the referee because I injured my ankle.
I normally lend my lighter to my friend to light a cigarette, but I didn't this time because my friend had a new ashtray.
I usually don't mind when Kate has a party, but this time I did because she is friends with me.
I deserve a reserved seat at the front of the lecture hall because I want the professor to see my face.
I am justified in expecting a hot breakfast while staying in a cheap motel.
